mutants.code:
import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

def get_active_users(conn):
    cur = conn.cursor()
    six_months_ago = (datetime.now() - timedelta(days=183)).strftime('')
    cur.execute('\n        SELECT users.username\n        FROM users\n        JOIN posts ON users.id = posts.user_id\n        WHERE posts.created_date >= ?\n        GROUP BY users.username\n        HAVING COUNT(posts.id) > 5\n    ', (six_months_ago,))
    return cur.fetchall()

import sqlite3
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

def get_active_users(conn):
    cur = conn.cursor()
    six_months_ago = (datetime.now() - timedelta(days=183)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
    cur.execute('', (six_months_ago,))
    return cur.fetchall()
